data.eml:eml: A new hypogeal species of Oregmopyga Hoy (Hemiptera: Coccoidea: Eriococcidae) from southern California, U. S. A., and a key to species of the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kondo, Takumasa, Gullan, Penny J., Miller, Douglass R. (2004): A new hypogeal species of Oregmopyga Hoy (Hemiptera: Coccoidea: Eriococcidae) from southern California, U. S. A., and a key to species of the genus. Zootaxa 784: 1-12, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.158056
